effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
